title: Baked risotto
description: This super-healthy three-step risotto is packed with vegetables and ready in less than 30 minutes.

default: ½ red pepper, stalk and seeds removed, chopped
2 small mushrooms, peeled, chopped or torn
large pinch stock or bouillon powder

steps: Grease a lidded ovenproof dish with a little oil and pour in the rice. Add the red pepper, spring onion, peas, mushrooms and chicken and stir until well combined.
Pour in the boiling water and add the stock powder or bouillon. Cover the dish with the lid.
Transfer the dish to the oven and bake for 15 minutes, or until the rice is tender. Set aside to cool slightly before serving.
